Package javelin.model.item.artifact

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AmuletOfHealth
    Raises Monster.constitution
    Artifact
    A special kind of item that is equipabble and is not allowed to be crafted on Towns but can be found on other occasions such as in a Merchants' possession, Treasure chests and at the Arcane University.
    BeltOfGiantStrength
    Raises Monster.strength by +2.
    CloakOfCharisma
    Raises Monster.charisma.
    CloakOfResistance
    Adds bonus to saving throws.
    GlovesOfDexterity
    Raise Monster.dexterity
    GogglesOfNight
    Provide darkvision.
    HeadbandOfIntellect
    Adds Monster.intelligence.
    MantleOfSpellResistance
    Adds to Monster.resistance.
    PeriaptOfWisdom
    Raises Monster.wisdom.
    RingOfEnergyResistance
    Adds to Monster.resistance.
    RingOfProtection
    Adds AC bonus.
    Slot
    Complete adaptation from http://www.d20srd.org/srd/magicItems/creatingMagicItems.htm# bodySlotAffinities .
    WingsOfFlying
    Turn a unit into a flying unit.
